events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product arrived with a large scratch on the surface and seems faulty.
The reported problem has been labelled as a product defect based on the customer's description of damage.
An agent specializing in product defects has been assigned to handle this case for faster resolution.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I'm sorry to hear about the damaged product you received.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and the packaging so we can assess the issue properly?
I have attached several pictures showing the scratch and the box it came in, as you requested.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can send you a replacement immediately or offer a full refund if you prefer.
Thanks for the quick response. I would like to receive a replacement as soon as possible.
Your replacement order has been shipped today, and you will receive the tracking number shortly.
Just checking in to make sure the replacement product arrived in perfect condition and meets your expectations.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and is in perfect condition. Thank you for the excellent service!
We are happy to hear that the issue was resolved. Closing the case now, and feel free to contact us anytime.
